title: Menacing Attack
content:
ck Tips & Notes

Difficulty Class of this Attack is 10 + STR or DEX Modifier, whichever is higher.

Traits and Features Ability Drain ♦ Abjuration Savant ♦ Absorb Elements ♦ Acolyte of Nature ♦ Action Surge ♦ Adamantine Skin ♦ Additional Ki Point ♦ Additional Proficiencies ♦ Additional Rage Charge ♦ Advanced Unarmoured Movement ♦ Agile Chassis ♦ Agonizing Blast ♦ Animal Aspect ♦ Arcane Shoot ♦ Arcane Shot ♦ Arcane Ward ♦ Archery ♦ Arctic ♦ Armour of Hexes ♦ Armour of Shadows ♦ Artificer's Lore ♦
